Description: Large scale inference on EKS using AWS Graviton, Inferentia2 and GPU

Fn::Join:
#!/bin/bash 
echo 'Executing userdata script ...' | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
#sudo chmod 666 /tmp/bootstrap.log; sudo chown ec2-user:ec2-user /tmp/bootstrap.log 
date | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
sudo yum update | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
sudo yum install -y aws-cfn-bootstrap git | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c 'cd /home/ec2-user; git clone https://github.com/aws-samples/aws-do-eks.git | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo bash -c '/home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-aws-cli.sh | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo bash -c '/home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-eksctl.sh | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo bash -c '/home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-kubectl.sh | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo bash -c '/home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-kubectx.sh | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo bash -c '/home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-kubeps1.sh | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo bash -c '/home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-docker-yum.sh | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo bash -c 'ln -s /usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/python | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c '/home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-envsubst.sh | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c 'source /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/wd/cfn/inference-workshop/.env; cat /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/wd/conf/eksctl/yaml/eks-inference-workshop.yaml-template | envsubst | sudo tee /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/wd/conf/eksctl/yaml/eks-inference-workshop.yaml' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c 'cat /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/wd/conf/eksctl/yaml/eks-inference-workshop.yaml | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c 'echo Creating EKS cluster ... | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c '/usr/local/bin/eksctl create cluster -f /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/wd/conf/eksctl/yaml/eks-inference-workshop.yaml | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c 'source /home/ec2-user/.bashrc; sleep 2; aws eks update-kubeconfig --name eks-inference-workshop | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c '/home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/deployment/neuron-device-driver/labels-add.sh | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c 'kubectl apply -f /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/deployment/neuron-device-driver/neuron2-device-driver-daemonset.yaml | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c '/home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/deployment/neuron-device-plugin/deploy.sh | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
sudo su ec2-user bash -c 'chmod +x /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-cloudwatch-addon.sh; /home/ec2-user/aws-do-eks/Container-Root/eks/ops/setup/install-cloudwatch-addon.sh | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log' 
date | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log 
echo 'Done executing userdata script.' | sudo tee -a /tmp/bootstrap.log
